messages.message: ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes.sec2 must contain "name" and "in" since value of "type" is "apiKey"
ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes.sec4 must contain "name" and "in" since value of "type" is "apiKey"
Expected security scheme "sec3" from ois.[0].apiSpecifications.security.sec3 to be present in ois.[0].apiSpecifications.components.securitySchemes
OIS "myOisTitle" must contain security scheme "sec3", as it is specified in apiCredentials.[1]
OIS "anotherOis" must contain security scheme "sec1", as it is specified in apiCredentials.[2]
